message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its value may differ. I'd like to propose a price of $95 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. I would like to counteroffer at $85.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to pay more. I would like to counter your offer at $90 for the product. I believe this reflects its true value while remaining within your budget.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I respect the value you place on your product, I would like to counter at $87.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to counter your offer at $89 for the product. This price reflects its value while remaining competitive for both of us.
I've reviewed your counteroffer, Alice. I would like to counter at $88.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the ongoing discussion, I would like to counter your offer at $88.50 for the product. This price acknowledges the value we both see in it.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I would like to counter at $88.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to counter your offer at $88.25 for the product. This price aims to reach a fair compromise between our valuations.
Considering the negotiations, I would like to counter at $88.
